msbt.message: Oh, ! You're just in time, .<20_2 arg="5" /><20_2 arg="7" /> was just about to regale us with an exhilarating tale of her exploits.<20_2 arg="5" />We're all ears, .
<20_3 arg="8" />Yeah, you're gonna love this, . You ready for an awesome story?
I gotta hear this!
Not interested.
Alright, <20_2 arg="2" />so I like hot baths. SUPER hot baths. The hotter the better.
! <20_2 arg="1" />I love a hot bath. They're fabulous for the complexion! And so relaxing too.

Exactly! <20_2 arg="2" />Anyway, the other day I wanted an EXTRA-super-hot bath. Like, rolling-boil hot.Two minutes after I get in, this smell hits my noseand it made me kinda hungry! Then it hit me!My water was so hot, I was basically making soup!One onion and a carrot more, and I'd have been a meal, !

So THAT's why you look so flushed!<20_2 arg="3" /> Darling, water that hot is very, very bad for you.Hot baths are wonderful, but there's a limit. Not to worry—I have a skin cream that's PERFECT for burns.
OK, <20_2 arg="2" />so a few years back I went to a dinner party. The whole thing was WAY outside my comfort zone
Oh, <20_2 arg="1" />dinner parties are wonderful! Hors d'oeuvres and conversation and everyone in their finery! Such fun!

Right, except nobody told me it was a FANCY dinner party!<20_2 arg="4" /><20_3 arg="8" />I rolled up in my rocker gear—torn jeans and spiky hair—THEN had to figure out, like, ten different spoons!When the soup came out, I gave up. I just drank out of the bowl.So yeah, there's punk-rocker me, facedown in her fancy food. Not. My. Scene.
Oh dear! <20_2 arg="1" />, you poor thing.Well, dinner-party etiquette isn't THAT hard. Let me help you. First, let's talk about spoons
<20_2 arg="2" />You know that little static zap you get sometimes when you touch someone else or, like, a doorknob?
Oh, I hate those! I'm always worried the shock will mess up my hair.

Well, if you rub your socks into the carpet, you can build up a major zap.<20_3 arg="8" /><20_2 arg="4" /> I used to zap EVERYONE!Mom? ZAP! Dad? ZAP! Friends? ZAP, ZAP, ZAP! I was like a little super villain!Then one summer I zapped my mom and she dropped a mega-nice vase. She was soooo angry.She took away my socks, and I got grounded for a MONTH<10_4 /> Ha! Grounded! Bwa ha ha!
That much static electricity?<20_2 arg="3" /> Oh dear. No wonder your hair always looks like that!
<20_3 arg="8" />Pfft! Your loss. <20_2 arg="5" />You're gonna wish you'd heard these stories after I get a book deal for 'em, !
You're writing a book?! What color is the cover going to be? Do you need help choosing a font?Oh! Oh! I know an agent! When should we start planning the release party? Tell me EVERYTHING!
Oh, ! <20_2 arg="3" />Thank you for letting me borrow that movie. I just adored it!The scenes were so gorgeous! The heroine's cape! The hero's scarf! It was all so incredibly stylish!
Remember the hover-car chase?<20_2 arg="4" /> It was like vrooom, zhiiiooo, bawaang, KABOOM! So insanely awesome!
All the extras in ceremonial robes with silver intaglio<20_2 arg="3" />the tiaras and chapeaus everyone woreso lovely!
What did you think of the fight with the giant robot? <20_2 arg="4" />When it punched a hole through the planet? WHOA!

Yes! <20_2 arg="3" />The robot's gold chassis with violet piping and that gothic spired crownit was DRENCHED in style!Wait, did you say it punched a hole through a planet? When? How did I miss that? That sounds amazing!
Hey , <20_2 arg="4" />I started that soap opera you recommended. It's got so many cool characters!I watched like a hundred episodes last weekend. I am STOKED for more!
Oh? Fantastic!<20_2 arg="3" />What did you think of the romance between the amnesiac and the mayor? So heartbreaking!
Wait<20_2 arg="4" />which amnesiac? You mean the councilman, or the doctor's cousin, or the lawyer's buddy?

No, <20_2 arg="3" />I'm talking about the amnesiac who got lost on the tour bus with the other amnesiacs, .You know, the school principal's secret twin. The one that interrupted that OTHER amnesiac's wedding.
Hang on, hang on, <20_2 arg="4" />you lost me Which amnesiac are you talkin' about, ?You mean the police chief's mother? Or the coach? Is it the chef's roommate's nephew's friend?
I'm going to a costume party next weekend and I just bought the MOST fabulous outfit for it.
A costume party? <20_2 arg="4" />Like, masks and stuff? Not knowing who's who? That kinda thing?
That's exactly right! <20_2 arg="3" />My friends and I haven't been to one in ages. It's going to be so much fun!! Would you like to come, ?
I'm not really the fancy costume- party type. Wait, hang on. Did you just say ""?
Why yes, I did!<20_2 arg="3" /> I say all the time! Do you like it? It's the talk of !Just come to the party. I know you'll have fun. Oh! Especially if you use "" as an icebreaker!
You think? Uh<20_2 arg="4" />sure! I can say "" a bunch. No sweat. ! Rolls off the tongue!Well, I'm gonna go put together a sweet costume. See you at the party, !
